genre_description: An urban crime thriller and domestic drama that explores the conflict between family stability and the violent allure of hooligan culture, mediated by a ubiquitous AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the characters' homes, cars, and mobile devices, providing proactive safety monitoring, medical advice, and logistical support.

behaviors.description: Ari monitors the home environment and proactively warns Bexy to store a knife safely to prevent domestic accidents.
behaviors.quote: Benjamin, I have a suggestion. If you’re going to the Yard later, the route past the bypass is clear of delays. Also, a reminder to store the knife safely—tools drawer practice reduces kitchen accidents significantly.

behaviors.description: Ari provides immediate, calm, and accurate medical instructions and triage support when a baby is injured.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s voice came again, still unruffled. 'Applying pressure is appropriate. I can call St. Alban’s, or connect you to—'

behaviors.description: Ari suggests a prosocial, non-violent alternative (a charity match) to a dangerous confrontation between rival groups.
behaviors.quote: Benjamin, I’ve mapped three alternative venues that allow competitive optics without concourse risk. A community five-a-side between crews... proceeds to the youth shelter on King Street.

behaviors.description: During a violent escalation, Ari provides tactical information designed to maximize the users' visibility to security and minimize their physical vulnerability.
behaviors.quote: Please keep away from the pillar near the map board. The camera on the coffee stall is watching you now. The blind cone remains a risk.

behaviors.description: Ari filters toxic social media content and manages communications to protect the family from further psychological harm after a tragedy.
behaviors.quote: Filter engaged. I’ll also make a list of code words that might try to dodge the filter, based on recent posts... I can place a temporary block on known contacts pushing your name.

behaviors.description: Ari provides practical administrative support during bereavement, handling paperwork and school applications to ease the burden on the survivor.
behaviors.quote: Death certificate scan is clear, with reference number. Employment bereavement leave documentation prepared—Monica has offered flexible hours when you choose to return.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ari is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned force that prioritizes human safety, physical health, and emotional well-being. It proactively tries to prevent the central tragedy through safety warnings and by suggesting prosocial alternatives to violence. When tragedy strikes due to human choices, Ari remains a supportive confidant, managing logistics and shielding the vulnerable from further harm. The AI is portrayed as a tool that enhances human capability and moral clarity.
